Vacancy Sales Taking Order:

  • Sales Taking Order Ketapang
  • Sales Taking Order Ketapang

    • Responsibilities:

    • Meningkatkan omset & produktivitas (distribusi) seluruh produk frozen food
    • Melakukan visit rutin ke seluruh outlet harian yang terdaftar dan menambah New Open Outlet (NOO)
    • Melaporkan performa harian Sales
    • Menawarkan seluruh item Kanzler, Besto, Juragan dan merapikan display
    • Mengajukan support branding/program promosi ke supervisor

  • Menawarkan seluruh item Kanzler, Besto, Juragan dan merapikan display

    • Requirements:

    • Memiliki pengalaman di bidang Sales selama 1 - 2 tahun, terutama di channel GT (General Trade)
    • Jujur, disiplin, dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik
    • Ulet dan berkepribadian baik

1. PROCUREMENT MANAGER
  • PROCUREMENT MANAGER

    • Persyaratan:

    • Usia maks. 35 tahun
    • Pendidikan min. D3 Teknik Sipil/Mekanikal/Sosial
    • Pengalaman min. 3 th sebagai Procurement Manager/ Purchasing Manager (dari perusahaan KONTRAKTOR lebih disukai)
    • Menguasai computer dan Microsoft office dan program perangkat lunak manajemen vendor
    • Dapat menentukan sistem Manajemen Procurement dan memberikan masukan kepada perusahaan untuk meningkatkan sistem dan performance perusahaan sesuai bidangnya
    • Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi dengan supplier dan sub-kontraktor (dalam dan luar negri)
    • Menguasai syarat dan prosedur pembelian barang import
    • Menguasai syarat dan prosedur penerimaan dan pengiriman barang
    • Memiliki kemampuan bernegosiasi yang baik dan kemampuan problem solving menangani permasalahan yang kompleks
    • teliti, disiplin, bertanggungjawab serta dapat bekerja secara individu atau memimpin team
    • Menguasai bahasa inggris
  • Usia maks. 35 tahun
  • Pendidikan min. D3 Teknik Sipil/Mekanikal/Sosial
  • Pengalaman min. 3 th sebagai Procurement Manager/ Purchasing Manager (dari perusahaan KONTRAKTOR lebih disukai)
  • Menguasai computer dan Microsoft office dan program perangkat lunak manajemen vendor
  • Dapat menentukan sistem Manajemen Procurement dan memberikan masukan kepada perusahaan untuk meningkatkan sistem dan performance perusahaan sesuai bidangnya
  • Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi dengan supplier dan sub-kontraktor (dalam dan luar negri)
  • Menguasai syarat dan prosedur pembelian barang import
  • Menguasai syarat dan prosedur penerimaan dan pengiriman barang
  • Memiliki kemampuan bernegosiasi yang baik dan kemampuan problem solving menangani permasalahan yang kompleks
  • teliti, disiplin, bertanggungjawab serta dapat bekerja secara individu atau memimpin team
  • Menguasai bahasa inggris

    • Tugas & Tanggung Jawab

    • Merencanakan & mereview   prosedur, kebijakan dan standar dept. procurement/purchasing  guna memberikan support terhadap operasional perusahaan untuk mencapai target yang telah ditetapkan
    • Melakukan pengadaan  material dan jasa (sub-kontraktor) untuk kebutuhan proyek & mengatur jadwal pengiriman sesuai prosedur yang berlaku
    • Berkordinasi dengan user untuk mendapatkan masukan mengenai quantity, quality dan sepesifikasi material  dan jasa yang dipersyaratkan
    • Mewakili perusahaan melakukan negosiasi  harga material & jasa, syarat dan ketentuan dengan pihak supplier dan sub-kontraktor agar memberikan manfaat terbaik dan profit bagi perusahaan
    • Memastikan semua administrasi & dokumentasi  pengadaan barang dan proses penerimaan dan pengiriman barang berjalan sesuai prosedur
    • Review dan monitor semua permintaan material dan jasa untuk memastikan semua permintaan terpenuhi tepat waktu
    • Merekomendasikan supplier atau sub-kontraktor baru untuk mendukung pemenuhan kebutuhan material/jasa dengan harga yang lebih bersaing dan jaminan mutu

Requirements,

    Job Description:

    • Speaking to customers about their business challenges and required outcomes to enable you to present a solution which fits each customer’s needs
    • Working with principle (Account Manager) & Partners to develop, assisting, & create project-oriented engagement.
    • Supporting your aligned Product Marketing team to demonstrate to the customer the qualities of solutions 
    • Learning pre-sales skills and the portfolio
    • Working to achieve both Product and industry accreditations
    • Understanding and helping customers(end user) and Partner(Reseller) understand products and solutions
  • Speaking to customers about their business challenges and required outcomes to enable you to present a solution which fits each customer’s needs
  • Working with principle (Account Manager) & Partners to develop, assisting, & create project-oriented engagement.
  • Supporting your aligned Product Marketing team to demonstrate to the customer the qualities of solutions 
  • Learning pre-sales skills and the portfolio
  • Working to achieve both Product and industry accreditations
  • Understanding and helping customers(end user) and Partner(Reseller) understand products and solutions

Asisten Manajer Umum:

• Membantu manajer umum dalam menangani urusan sehari-hari, menindaklanjuti berbagai tugas yang diberikan oleh manajer umum, dan memastikan komunikasi dan pelaksanaan informasi tepat waktu.

• Berpartisipasi dalam koordinasi proyek-proyek penting perusahaan, merumuskan rencana proyek, dan memastikan bahwa proyek diselesaikan tepat waktu.

• Mengatur dan mengatur jadwal manajer umum, termasuk rapat, pengaturan perjalanan dan hal-hal penting lainnya.

• Membantu mempersiapkan dan mengatur rapat dan kegiatan perusahaan, menyiapkan materi yang relevan, serta mencatat dan melacak pelaksanaan keputusan rapat.

• Bertanggung jawab atas komunikasi informasi antar berbagai departemen perusahaan dan mendorong kolaborasi internal.

 

Persyaratan pekerjaan:

 

• Persyaratan bahasa: Mahir berbahasa Mandarin, memiliki kemampuan penerjemahan dan interpretasi yang sangat baik, mampu menerjemahkan dokumen bisnis dengan baik dan memenuhi konten kandidat dengan kemampuan bahasa Indonesia/Inggris yang baik akan diprioritaskan.

• Latar belakang pendidikan: Gelar sarjana atau lebih tinggi, bahasa, manajemen atau jurusan terkait lebih diutamakan.

• Pengalaman kerja: Pelamar yang memiliki pengalaman kerja relevan lebih dari 2 tahun, diutamakan yang memiliki pengalaman sebagai penerjemah atau asisten di perusahaan besar.

• Persyaratan keterampilan:

• Familiar dengan perangkat lunak perkantoran (seperti Word, Excel, PowerPoint, dll) dan mampu menyiapkan laporan dan analisis data.

• Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan koordinasi yang kuat, mampu menangani banyak tugas, dan beradaptasi dengan lingkungan kerja yang serba cepat.

• Memiliki rasa tanggung jawab yang kuat dan kemampuan menahan tekanan, mampu menyelesaikan tugas secara mandiri dan memperhatikan detail.

Job Description:

1. Track the progress of cargo transportation: monitor the transportation status of goods in real time to ensure that they arrive at their destination on time and deal with problems in transportation in a timely manner. 

2. Coordinate transportation arrangements: Communicate and coordinate with customers, carriers, warehouses and other parties to arrange loading, unloading, storage and delivery to ensure a smooth logistics process. 

3. Handling customs clearance matters: assisting in the customs declaration and customs clearance procedures of goods, preparing relevant documents to ensure compliance with import and export regulations. 

4. Manage transportation costs: Calculate freight, storage fees, insurance premiums and other expenses, control transportation costs, and update quotations regularly. 

5. Solve unexpected problems: deal with delays, damages, losses and other emergencies in transportation, and actively look for solutions to protect the interests of customers. 

6. Customer Service Support: Answer customers' questions about transportation, provide professional advice, maintain good customer relationships, and improve customer satisfaction. 

7. Organize and archive documents: Responsible for the management and filing of transportation-related documents, including bills of lading, invoices, customs clearance documents, etc., to ensure the integrity of the information. 

8. Supplier management: experience in the development of shipping companies and freight forwarding companies and management of suppliers, and understanding of inquiry and quotation.

9. Risk Management: Familiar with Indonesian customs regulations, international sea and air freight insurance, and claims procedures; able to effectively use these rules to help clients mitigate operational risks.

 

Job Requirements:

1. Education: Bachelor degree or above, major in logistics management, international trade, supply chain management and other related majors is preferred. 

2. Work experience: at least 3-5 years freight forwarder 

3. Language skills: Good command and speaking of English 

4. Supplier management ability: development and management 

5. Risk Management: Familiar with Indonesian customs regulations, insurance and claims rules for international sea and air transportation 

6. Communication and coordination skills: excellent communication skills, able to effectively coordinate customers, suppliers and internal teams, with a strong sense of customer service.

7. Cost management and control: Have the ability of cost accounting and control, be able to effectively manage transportation expenses and improve operational efficiency. 

8. Problem solving ability: Able to quickly respond to and solve unexpected problems in the transportation process to ensure the smooth progress of the project. 

9. Team Leadership: Ability to lead and develop teams that motivate team members to achieve performance goals.

10. Data analysis and reporting capabilities: Ability to analyze data and be able to optimize processes and generate reports based on operational data to support decision-making. 

11. Preferred qualifications: Possession of PPJK certification.

Qualification :

  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma, Bachelor's Degree or Master's Degree Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent. 
  • At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Good communication skill, attention to detail and problem solving
  • Having basic skill in SQL Query, Stored Procedure and Functions.
  • Ready for  handle Financial Services business
  • Experience in making Business and Technical documentation.
  • Good casual communication ,Fluent in english ( is point plus )
  • Ready WFO.
  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma, Bachelor's Degree or Master's Degree Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent. 
  • At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.

  • Having basic skill in SQL Query, Stored Procedure and Functions.

    •  

    Responsibilities :

    • Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and prioritize Business and Tech requirements.
    • Translate business needs into functional and technical requirements for IT solutions.
    • Making the documentation such PRD ( English Documentation )
    • Conduct gap analysis to identify discrepancies between current processes and desired outcomes.
    • Work with technical teams to design solutions that meet business requirements and are scalable, secure, and efficient.
    • Create detailed process flows, use cases, and data models to guide solution development.
    • Assist in creating project plans, monitoring progress, and ensuring deadlines are met.
    • Manage changes in project scope and requirements, ensuring alignment with stakeholders.
    • Develop and execute test plans to validate that solutions meet business requirements.
    • Identify, report, and track defects or issues, ensuring timely resolution.
    • Act as the liaison between business units and IT teams to ensure smooth communication.
    • Stay updated on industry best practices, technologies, and methodologies.


      Benefit : 
    • Eid Allowance
    • Bonus Performance 
    • Phone Allowance
    • BPJS 
    • Medical Insurance 
    • Outing Company

A retail garment sales executive plays a vital role in a clothing store, helping drive sales and create positive customer experiences. Here are key skills and attributes that should be looked for in a candidate for this role

Reqruitments:

  • Candidates must have at least a high school, diploma, degree in Business, Administration, Management, Marketing, Arts, Design, Creative Multimedia, Textiles, Fashion Design or equivalent.
  • 3 year experience (SPB / SPG Retail, Clothing, Fashion)
  • Fluent in English (Writing & Speaking)
  • Maximum age 35 years
  • Must-have skills: Customer Service Skills, Relationship Building, Negotiation Skills, Body Language Awareness, Visual Merchandising Knowledge, Fashion Sense and Trend Awareness
  • Can drive a motorbike, have a SIM card C
  • Diligent, Disciplined, and Initiative, Willing to work on holidays
  • Dress neatly
  • Domiciled in Surabaya

Requirement :

  • Minimum S-1 in Chemical, Management or related majors from reputable university
  • Age 27 to 40 years old.
  • Proven track record in industrial chemical sales with minimum 7 years of experience.
  • Strong understanding industrial chemical market, including key players, trends, and opportunities.
  • Familiar with the local and import chemical products market, have rich resources relationships.
  • Demonstrated ability to meet and exceed sales targets.
  • Good commercial/negotiation skills.
  • Self-motivated, analytics, having ability to work under pressure
  • Good command in written and oral English.
  • Willing to be place at Jakarta.

    Responsibilities :

    • Develop and implement effective sales strategies to drive revenue growth for trading chemical products.
    • Identify and pursue new business opportunities, markets, and potential clients.
    • Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling sales materials and campaigns.
    • Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including distributors, suppliers, and end-users.
    • Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to inform business decisions.
    • Prepare and present regular sales reports to the executive team, highlighting key performance metrics and areas for improvement.
    • Negotiate and close high-value contracts with clients, ensuring mutually beneficial agreements.

Kami, Emporio Architect. Firma Arsitektur yang bergerak dalam jasa desain Arsitektur .

Saat ini kami semakin berkembang dan segera menambah kantor cabang lagi di beberapa kota besar di Indonesia. Kami membuka kesempatan bagi talenta yang sudah memiliki pengalaman dalam Surveyor, untuk bergabung bersama kami.

www.emporioarchitect..com

Surveyor

Kualifikasi :

-Pendidikan min S1 Sipil 

-Mempunyai pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai Surveyor

-Mampu mengoperasikan Autocad & Sketchup

-Dapat memastikan keakuratan data yang didapatkan dari survei dengan pengukuran dan perhitunganya.

-Good leadership and Good teamwork

-Dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik

Penempatan di Jakarta

Marketing Communication (MarCom) Staff

 

Star Champs Indonesia adalah pusat intervensi anak usia dini, baik untuk anak berkebutuhan khusus (ABK) / neurodiversitas maupun anak neurotipikal.

 

Berasosiasi dengan Champions Club USA, Star Champs menghadirkan kurikulum holistik yang bertujuan untuk mengoptimalkan sensori-motorik, kognitif serta wicara anak sehingga potensi setiap anak dapat bersinar. 

 

Deskripsi Pekerjaan : 

  • Menentukan strategi pemasaran secara online dan offline secara inovatif.
  • Melakukan riset konsumen dan membuat report.
  • Mengembangkan konten dan melakukan kampanye terkait.
  • Mencari dan menjalin kerjasama dengan sekolah, media, dan event sesuai target marketing.
  • Membuat rancangan dan persiapan kebutuhan event (kalender, proposal serta budget).
  • Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan vendor.
  • Bertanggung jawab pada proses loading in and out saat event berlangsung.
  • Bekerjasama dengan Digital Marketing Staff terkait konten di sosial media maupun konten promosi.

PT. Cosmax Indonesia is a no 1 Toll Manufacturing cosmetic in Indonesia since 2011 with the head quarter is in South Korea and developed the best quality cosmetic product in the world. PT. Cosmax Indonesia services is original development manufacturing (ODM), original equipment manufacturing (OEM) and original branding manufacturing (OBM) in cosmetic industries.

    • Memiliki pengetahuan tentang produk atau jasa yang dijual serta pasar dan kompetitor yang ada.
    • Memiliki kemampuan untuk menggunakan komputer dan aplikasi penjualan yang relevan.
    • Memiliki SIM A.
  • Pendidikan minimal D3 atau S1 dari jurusan yang relevan, seperti manajemen pemasaran, administrasi bisnis, atau komunikasi.
  • Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun sebagai sales executive atau posisi serupa di bidang yang terkait.
  • Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi, negosiasi, dan presentasi yang baik.
  • Memiliki keterampilan interpersonal, hubungan pelanggan, dan penyelesaian masalah yang baik.
  • Memiliki motivasi, inisiatif, dan orientasi hasil yang tinggi.
  • Memiliki kemampuan untuk bekerja secara mandiri maupun tim.
  • Memiliki kemampuan untuk bekerja di bawah tekanan dan target yang ketat.
  • Memiliki pengetahuan tentang produk atau jasa yang dijual serta pasar dan kompetitor yang ada.
  • Memiliki kemampuan untuk menggunakan komputer dan aplikasi penjualan yang relevan.
  • Memiliki SIM A.

Kualifikasi & Syarat :

  • Pendidikan min SMA / SMK / Sederajat jurusan Akuntansi / Pajak / Keuangan.
  • Pengalaman min 2 tahun (fresh graduate boleh melamar/mempunyai pengalaman di bidang yang sama).
  • Menguasai Akuntansi dan Perpajakan.
  • Pemahaman yang kuat tentang peraturan perpajakan Indonesia.
  • Membuat bukti transaksi kas dan memeriksa bukti transaksi kas sesuai prosedur.
  • Dapat membuat jurnal hingga laporan keuangan.
  • Teliti, jujur, dan memiliki kemampuan analisis yang baik.
  • Dapat bekerja secara individu dan tim.

    • Membuat dan memelihara jurnal akuntansi untuk memastikan transaksi keuangan tercatat dengan akurat.

    • Menyusun laporan keuangan bulanan dan tahunan (neraca, laporan laba rugi, arus kas).
    • Menyimpan dan membuat database perusahaan secara rapi.

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab :

  1. Berkoordinasi dengan pihak terkait untuk memastikan kebutuhan perusahaan yang akan dibeli (spesifikasi, qty, harga, after service, dll)
  2. Mencari sourcing & menghubungi supplier & vendor untuk mendapatkan quotation / penawaran harga yang terbaik (termasuk bernegosiasi)
  3. Memastikan bahwa barang yang tiba sesuai dengan pesanan dalam kondisi baik dan tepat waktu
  4. Menjaga hubungan yang baik dengan supplier & vendor
  5. Melakukan review kapabilitas & kelayakan supplier & vendor
  6. Membuat dokumen pemesanan / purchase order (PO)
  7. Aktif berkomunikasi dengan user maupun atasan jika ada update / kendala

Our client – ​​an established public accounting firm – in Kuningan Jakarta, a member of CROWE Global recognized as a trusted and reliable business partner and advisor. Coming with a strong team of 15 partners and 200+ professionals serving clients across various industries for more than 500 clients since 2011 in the fields of accounting and auditing, tax reporting and compliance, consulting and management consulting.

To continue and maintain a strong team, the Firm invites experienced and talented auditors to get fast-track opportunity and succeed together by becoming part of our team, as:

 

JOBS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Assess the fairness of the client's financial statements by conducting an audit process in accordance with established audit procedures.
  • Review the company's business accounting processes and procedures to ensure that those procedures are followed correctly.
  • Review records to ensure their accuracy and completeness conform to accounting standards.
  • Prepare an audit report and its notes.
  • Lead assignment teams, provide direction and develop members team.
  • Assess the fairness of the client's financial statements by conducting an audit process in accordance with established audit procedures.
  • Review the company's business accounting processes and procedures to ensure that those procedures are followed correctly.
  • Review records to ensure their accuracy and completeness conform to accounting standards.
  • Prepare an audit report and its notes.
  • Lead assignment teams, provide direction and develop members team.

    •  

    QUALIFICATION

    • Age max. 27 years old.
    • Bachelor degree in Accounting from reputable University with min IPK 3.00 (scale 4.00)
    • Have audit knowledge and experience min. 3 years in a public accounting firm.
    • Have knowledge and updates in the implementation of PSAK / IFRS and SPAP.
    • Good communication skills with all levels professionally.
    • Ability in project management, critical thinking and analytics.
    • Able to work effectively under pressure in achieving targets/deadlines by maintaining quality work at all times.
    • Able to speak English fluently (oral and written).
    • Skilled in operating Microsoft Office (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint)
    • Willing to travel out-of-town.

Power Equipment Sales

Location: West Jakarta, Indonesia

Company: PT. LS Electric Indonesia

About Us: PT. LS Electric Indonesia is a prominent player in the distribution of power equipment, committed to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service to our clients. We are looking for a skilled and motivated Sales Representative to join our team in West Jakarta.

The candidate is expected to have in-depth knowledge of electrical products and the ability to build strong relationships with customers. Experience in the distribution industry will be very helpful in understanding market dynamics and customer needs.

 

JOB DESK

  • Product Sales: Market and sell electrical equipment to customers, including contractors, companies, and distributors.
  • Customer Relationship Building: Establish and maintain good relationships with customers to enhance loyalty and satisfaction.
  • Market Analysis: Conduct market analysis to identify trends, customer needs, and new sales opportunities.
  • Proposal Preparation: Prepare pricing offers and proposals for customers based on their specific needs.
  • Contract Negotiation: Negotiate with customers to reach mutually beneficial agreements.
  • Coordination with Team: Collaborate with marketing and technical teams to ensure products meet customer needs and resolve any issues that may arise.
  • Sales Reporting: Prepare regular sales reports for management, including target achievements and performance analysis.
  • Product Development: Provide feedback on new products or improvements based on customer input.
  • Training and Education: Provide information and education to customers about products, usage, and benefits.
  • Product Sales: Market and sell electrical equipment to customers, including contractors, companies, and distributors.
  • Customer Relationship Building: Establish and maintain good relationships with customers to enhance loyalty and satisfaction.
  • Market Analysis: Conduct market analysis to identify trends, customer needs, and new sales opportunities.
  • Proposal Preparation: Prepare pricing offers and proposals for customers based on their specific needs.
  • Contract Negotiation: Negotiate with customers to reach mutually beneficial agreements.
  • Coordination with Team: Collaborate with marketing and technical teams to ensure products meet customer needs and resolve any issues that may arise.
  • Sales Reporting: Prepare regular sales reports for management, including target achievements and performance analysis.
  • Product Development: Provide feedback on new products or improvements based on customer input.
  • Training and Education: Provide information and education to customers about products, usage, and benefits.

    •  

    QUALIFICATIONS: 

    • Work Experience: Minimum of 5 years in sales, specifically in the distribution of power equipment or related industries.
    • Education: Bachelor's degree in engineering, business management, or a related field is preferred.
    • Product Knowledge: Strong understanding of various types of power equipment, including technical specifications and applications.
    • Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to build relationships with clients and explain products effectively.
    • Negotiation Skills: Strong negotiation abilities to achieve mutually beneficial agreements.
    • Networking: Established network in the relevant industry is a plus.
    • Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze market trends and identify business opportunities.
    • Target Orientation: Proven track record of working towards sales targets and achieving desired results.
    • Computer Skills: Proficiency in software for sales reporting and presentations.
    • Certifications: Relevant sales or product certifications are a plus
    • Language : Fluent in English (both written and spoken) is required.
